A large, round wine glass with a wide bowl and long, slender stem, filled just below the halfway point with red wine. The glass is made of clear, reflective glass and sits on a smooth, light-gray surface.
A transparent wine glass featuring a spherical bowl and a narrow stem, holding dark red wine up to the widest part of the bowl.

A crystal-clear wine glass positioned upright, filled with red wine that reaches the midpoint of its rounded bowl. The stem is straight and thin, and the base rests flat on a clean, light-colored surface.

A clear wine glass with a tall, narrow stem and a slightly tapered bowl, filled about halfway with pale yellow-white wine. The glass stands on a flat, white surface with soft lighting and minimal shadows. A transparent wine glass with a long, slim stem and a vertically elongated bowl. The glass is filled to just under the midpoint with white wine, showing a light golden hue.
